fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- A Were Killing role will always spawn.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill
- Members have detection immunity on moonless nights.
- If the Were are in the game, each Full Moon has an X% chance to be a Hunting Moon, where X is 50 plus an additional 15 for each Full Moon since the last Hunting Moon. 
- During Hunting Moons, Weres have their Hunting Moon Enhancement attributes.
- Hunting Moons are not announced to the Town.
